Package net.silthus.schat.repository

Interface Repository<K,E extends Entity<K>>

Type Parameters:
K - the type of the key
E - the type of the entity
All Known Subinterfaces:
ChannelRepository, ChatterRepository
All Known Implementing Classes:
InMemoryRepository
public interface Repository<K,E extends Entity<K>>
A generic repository for entities.
Since:
1.0.0

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static class 
    Repository.NotFound
    The exception is thrown if no entity with the given key exists inside the repository.

    • get

      @NotNull E get(@NotNull K id) throws Repository.NotFound
      Tries to find an entity by its id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the entity
      Returns:
      the chatter if found, else throws NotFound
      Throws:
      Repository.NotFound - if entity does not exist
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • add

      void add(@NotNull E entity)
      Adds the given entity to the repository if it does not exist.

      Does nothing if the entity already exists.

      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to add
      Since:
      1.0.0

      Removes the entity with the given key from the repository.
      Parameters:

    • remove

      @Nullable default E remove(@NotNull E entity)
      Removes the given entity from the repository if it exists.

      Does nothing if the entity does not exist.

      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to remove
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • filter

      @NotNull default @NotNull @Unmodifiable List<E> filter(@NonNull @NonNull Predicate<E> filter)
      Filters the elements in this repository by the given predicate.

      This is the same as stream().filter(...) but without the overhead of streams.

      Parameters:
      filter - the predicate to filter for
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable filtered list of entities matching the filter
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • find

      default Optional<E> find(K key)
      Tries to find an entity in this repository with the given key.
      Parameters:
      key - the key of the entity
      Returns:
      the found entity or an empty optional
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • findOrCreate

      default E findOrCreate(K key, Function<K,E> creator)
      Tries to find an entity with the given key in this repository or creates it if it does not exist.
      Parameters:
      key - the key of the entity
      creator - the function used to create the entity if it does not exist
      Returns:
      the existing or newly created entity
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • find

      @NotNull default @NotNull Optional<E> find(@NonNull @NonNull Predicate<E> filter)
      Tries to find an entity matching the given filter and returns the first match.
      Parameters:
      filter - the filter used to search for the entity
      Returns:
      the entity if found
      Since:
      1.0.0
